field.label: Enable UnboundBL
field.help: Turn off and on. This will basically clear your UnboundBL.conf file, so it can remain in your Unbound configuration but not affect connectivity.

field.label: Whitelist
field.help: Enter the domains that you would like to whitelist (eg. remove from blacklist files).

field.label: Blacklist
field.help: Enter the blacklist URL's you would like to parse and use.
